${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.NAME: The Suckamid
${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Capacitor !${ModID}:m2!. NL Heal !M! hp and retain your hand for 1 turn. NL stslib:Purge.
${ModID}:TheSuckamidRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Capacitor !${ModID}:m2!. NL Heal !M! hp and retain your hand for 2 turns. NL stslib:Purge.

${ModID}:ArrowStormRareAttack.NAME: Arrow Storm
${ModID}:ArrowStormRareAttack.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Attack cards in your hand, if you exhausted a card, deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times.

${ModID}:MeatyCroquettesSpecialColourles.NAME: Meaty Croquettes
${ModID}:MeatyCroquettesSpecialColourles.DESCRIPTION: Retain, ${ModID}:Croquette. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FishyCroquettesSpecialColourles.NAME: Fishy Croquettes
${ModID}:FishyCroquettesSpecialColourles.DESCRIPTION: Retain, ${ModID}:Croquette. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FriendshipCroquettesSpecialColo.NAME: Friendship Croquettes
${ModID}:FriendshipCroquettesSpecialColo.DESCRIPTION: Retain, ${ModID}:Croquette. NL Gain !B! Block, Exhaust. NL When Retained, increase its Block by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:MysteryCroquettesSpecialColourl.NAME: Mystery Croquettes
${ModID}:MysteryCroquettesSpecialColourl.DESCRIPTION: Retain, ${ModID}:Croquette. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TopOfTheSkyUncommonAttack.NAME: Top of the Sky
${ModID}:TopOfTheSkyUncommonAttack.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Returns to your hand on play. NL Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block. Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:BucketOfDregsUncommonSkill.NAME: Bucket Of Dregs
${ModID}:BucketOfDregsUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable, Retain. When Retained, heal ALL enemies for !M! and gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.NAME: Rea--dy!
${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Temporary Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Rea__dyCommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Temporary Dexterity. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
